headline: RBC Capital Raises its Price Target on Global Payments Inc. (GPN) to $97 and Maintains a Sector Perform Rating
summary: Global Payments Inc. (NYSE:GPN) is among the 10 High Growth S&P 500 Stocks to Buy Now. RBC Capital on February 19, 2026, raised its price target on Global Payments Inc. (NYSE:GPN) to $97 from $95 and maintained a Sector Perform rating, citing the company’s Q4 earnings beat. RBC Capital added that management’s FY26 guidance appears […]
